title: Bug 7581: ComboBoxCellEditor sizing issue in property sheet
description: From ECJoe Winchester <JoeWin@us.ibm.com wrote in message news:3C407F76.31A82113@us.ibm.com...
OB: The ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in the property sheet.
EB: The ComboBoxCellEditor should size correctly in the property sheet, adjusting to the content as expected.
SR:
1. Open the property sheet.
2. Navigate to a section using the ComboBoxCellEditor.
3. Observe that the ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly.
